item.title: Load the Widget
item.description: Load the Okta Sign-In Widget Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Load the Widget: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-widget-use-case-load/aspnet/main/ Embedded Okta Sign-In Widget fundamentals: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/embedded-siw/main/ - Include content from this doc to make a SPA dimension Structure type: Task Content type: Integration guide An integration guide or coding guide illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.

item.title: Sign in with Facebook
item.description: Sign in with Facebook Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title Since there is only one use case it doesn’t make sense to move just this one guide to the “federate identities” group Links to original docs: - Sign in with Facebook using the Widget: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-embedded-widget-use-case-sign-in-soc-idp/aspnet/main/ Embedded Okta Sign-In Widget fundamentals: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/embedded-siw/main/ - Include content from this doc to make a SPA dimension Structure type: Task
